title: May the drones be with you!
detail:
Have you ever wanted to use the force? Now you can with our state of the art…

…force drone!

Our project is to create a drone that can be controlled with one’s hand. We’ll use a motion  camera to identify which gestures the user is making with their hand and identify the position of the user's arm. If a user points their arm in a direction, the drone will fly in the direction the arm is pointing.

The drone will also feature a box that opens when the drone starts flying and closes when the drone lands inside.
